title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing separation in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about separation in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin: To see separation in a dream indicates that the divorce will end with problems and the fulfillment of a dream and goal, and fear and anxiety about the future may appear like this. Dreams have a kind of fear and doubts about the person who sees the dream because dreams have an impact that sometimes affects our lives and can only happen in the present or in the near future so we will explain one of them which is seeing separation in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing separation in a dream by Imam Ibn In the following lines, we will tell you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about seeing divorce in a dream: The interpretation of a dream about separation, as explained by the researcher Ibn Sirin, is that it heralds goodness for whoever sees it. Seeing yourself exploding and crying in a dream is evidence of alleviating fear, losing sadness, and alleviating the problems and challenges of whoever sees it. Dreaming about separation. Hugging in a dream is one of the desirable trends that indicates the fulfillment of desires and success in work and learning. If you dream of seeing a farewell at the airport in a dream, this may indicate that you will soon travel for work and improve life or study. Seeing a child’s separation in a dream is evidence of a lot Of kindness, spacious living, and the blessings of money and comfort. Interpretation of a dream of seeing separation in a dream for a married woman. In the following lines, we will tell you the interpretation of a dream of seeing separation in a dream for a married woman: The interpretation of a dream of separation between spouses and crying in a dream for a married woman is evidence that the marital dispute has ended and that she will live with him in Happiness and stability in the future. Seeing a man’s separation and happiness in a married woman’s dream indicates his desire for divorce and divorce due to the many and varied problems between them. The interpretation of seeing separation and death in a married woman’s dream may indicate long life, health, prosperity, and the fulfillment of her desires. Seeing a father’s separation in a woman’s dream A married woman is evidence of a lot of sustenance and success. Interpretation of a dream about seeing separation in a dream for a married couple. In the following lines, we will tell you the interpretation of a dream about seeing yourself separated in a dream for a married couple: If the relationship between the two partners is dominated by love and understanding, then seeing the difference between them indicates increased love and closeness between them and a strong bond between them. If there is already a dispute, then seeing them separated may be a warning for an end to strife and strife and a return to good relations between them, peace and tranquility. Seeing separation between the two partners may indicate that the wife is approaching pregnancy. If a married man sees his separation from his wife and he is happy in a dream, There was in fact constant hostility between them, so this may in fact be a sign of separation and divorce. Read also: At the conclusion of this article, we explained to you sufficient information in the following lines on the topic of interpreting a dream about separation in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. These dreams raise doubts in their owners, because separation is something Feel helpless. And the weak in the case of crying and disappointment, we ask God to give you dreams filled with goodness and happiness, may God protect and protect you.

title: Seeing body hair removed in a dream

preview.html: Seeing body hair removed in a dream. Seeing body hair removed is a good dream that indicates the loss of worry and worry. The vision also indicates relief after fatigue and positive changes in the life of the dreamer or dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the legs for single women: Seeing hair removed means getting rid of sadness and anxiety. If he sees that he is shaving the hair of the leg of the foot, this indicates relief after fatigue. Also, seeing the body hair being shaved indicates relief from distress and paying off debts. It also indicates abundant nutrition and changing life for the better. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a man’s hair with a razor. Seeing a married woman shaving her body hair It indicates the collapse of worries and problems. This vision also indicates that a divorced or widowed woman will overcome difficult stages and new and positive changes in her life. If a pregnant woman sees that she is removing her body hair or part of her buttocks, leg, or arm, this means that she will get rid of pain and fatigue and will give birth. Easier and easier. The dream also indicates wealth and abundant money. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the legs with sweets for a married woman: Seeing wax with sweets or sweetness is a good vision that indicates a mood of worries, sadness, and problems. And if a married woman sees that she is removing hair from her legs with sweets, she is suffering from financial hardship and the accumulation of debts, This indicates the payment of her debts, and the improvement of her financial situation. If the hair is thick and she removes it completely, this indicates a solution to her problems and differences, in addition to positive changes in her life. Interpretation of seeing sweets and removing hair in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing sweets and removing hair from the body indicates the collapse of problems and problems. From her life. The vision also shows that she got rid of the tired people who caused her problems. The vision means obtaining money. Interpretation of seeing hand wax in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a girl pulling hair from her arms indicates that she has gone through difficult stages. Also, seeing hair removal indicates that she will get A high degree and she passes the stages of education with distinction if she is a student. Seeing hand wax can indicate unwise and unwise decisions. Interpretation of a dream about removing private hair for a single woman: Seeing that body hair is easily removed means that he will have many opportunities and that he will find a prestigious job. If she sees If a girl removes her pubic hair, this indicates that she is suffering from a problem and will find appropriate solutions for it. Also, seeing her shaving her pubic hair or sensitive areas indicates positive changes in her life, overcoming difficult stages, and overcoming crises. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from sensitive areas for a married woman is considered a vision of removing Hair from sensitive areas is a good vision that indicates getting rid of marital problems and disputes. It also indicates a desire that will be fulfilled. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the hands with wax: Seeing wax is difficult, but it indicates that difficult stages and experiences will be overcome and that the dreamer will be compensated for a better life. Vision A married woman and a pregnant woman removing her body hair with wax indicates that she is free from adversity and challenges

title: Interpretation of breast milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it FansSubscribed Fans The interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing breast milk in a dream means the end of all problems or tribulations that the dreamer is going through, except for the goodness, blessings and satisfaction that will come to him. What does it mean for milk to come out of the breast of an unmarried woman? To achieve things that were always impossible to achieve. What does the vision mean? Spoiled breast milk? Heralds the end of sadness and anguish. What is the importance of the milk that comes out of a man’s breast? It indicates the high status he receives in his work. The meaning of breast milk returning to a small basin in a dream? It expresses exposure to many problems and fears. Interpretation of milk coming out of The breast of a married woman. The milk that comes out of the breast in a dream of a married woman for a short period indicates that her fears about her new life will end and she will adapt quickly. The vision predicts that the woman will soon have children. The milk coming out of the breast determines the agreement with the wife and then living in an atmosphere of love and friendship that binds them. Then the vision symbolizes To the emotion that unites them and one cannot separate them. The milk that comes out of the right breast in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a long-awaited desire. Seeing the milk coming out of the left breast only indicates the birth of a beautiful and healthy baby girl. The vision heralds the recovery of a woman from an illness that she suffered from for a long time. And God knows best. Breastfeeding a small child in a dream indicates the end of the stressful and anxious situation that you are feeling. Interpretation of breast milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin claims that this dream indicates halal food. It is possible that this dream is that God is giving the child to the pioneer. Vision Another bad thing about this dream is that the dreamer will face problems and difficulties in his life. If a woman sees that she is breastfeeding a child, the doors of the world will be closed in her face. Whoever sees a woman pouring milk on a person’s face indicates that he will be imprisoned. An explanation of the large amount of milk coming out of the breast for a single woman. The abundant flow of milk represents The new job and then his arrival at an important source of livelihood. Look at the milk coming out of the breast. A free girl in a dream of achieving things that she thought were impossible to achieve. The vision symbolizes the great excellence that the girl achieves in her studies, so she will have an excellent position and be a source of pride for her family. The vision expresses the emergence The girl is relieved of the state of sadness she is experiencing due to the failure of a romantic relationship. The vision promises the achievement of goals and aspirations in a simple way. Then the vision shows marriage to a wealthy young man and his social status will rise. Seeing the girl breastfeeding a young child in a dream means getting rid of the burdens and pressures that she bears. Seeing the girl announcing the date of her engagement to a young man Fadel...feeling pain when milk comes out of the breast expresses exposure to problems. Interpretation of a dream about spoiled breast milkBad breast milk This portends in a dream the death of suffering and pain. The vision symbolizes a woman suffering from psychological problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing milk coming out of a widow’s breast symbolizes sight. Milk coming out Breasts in a dream: For a single widow to marry a man she knows. Seeing her in a dream foretells that one of her children will marry soon and have a grandson after several months of marriage. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing school in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a school in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the Roya website, as seeing a school in a dream is a sign of the disappearance of worries and sorrows. So we will talk about the interpretation of this dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a school in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a school in a dream for a single girl is an example of brilliant success and excellence in her studies and obtaining high grades. Seeing a single girl in school in a dream is a sign of the success of her engagement to her fiancé and the start of the marriage ceremony. Seeing a single woman from an old school in a dream is a sign. The beginning of a happy life with her husband and the presence of love and happiness between them. A single girl seeing her friends at school in a dream is an indication of the effort made to achieve her goals and her life’s dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about entering a school to memorize the Qur’an in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a single girl returning to school in a dream: Seeing a single girl Returning to her studies in a dream is an example of her intense fear of many pressures and problems in her life. Seeing a single woman returning to school in a dream indicates a lack of means of livelihood, extreme poverty, and efforts being made to improve the standard of living. See also: The interpretation of seeing Quranic verses in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman who Seeing a school in a dream: Seeing a married woman at school in a dream indicates the presence of happiness and love between her and her husband and the good upbringing of her children. Watching a wedding celebration at school for a married woman is an indicator of the success of her relationship with her husband and her struggle with her husband to improve her level. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees a school in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman in school in a dream is a sign of her feeling of security and love with her husband and family. Seeing a pregnant woman in school in a dream is an indication that her birth was safe and quiet and she gave birth to a good daughter. See also: Interpretation of seeing honor in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man or young man seeing a school in a dream: Seeing a man going to school in a dream is one of the promising visions that indicate his brilliant success at work and at home. Seeing a man going to school in a dream is a sign of increased livelihood, blessings and health. Seeing yourself sitting on a school desk in a dream is a sign of high status among friends and relatives, high morals, and people’s respect for him. Seeing classes School uniforms in a dream are a sign of easing things, and the single young man must get married soon and take responsibility. See also: Interpretation of seeing friends in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing school uniforms in a dream: Seeing school uniforms in a dream is an indication of the great value of the fortuneteller and the power of his knowledge and its use by people. Seeing Yourself wearing yellow clothes in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate a feeling of joy, happiness, and increased nutrition. Seeing red clothes in a dream is a sign of victory over the enemies of success. Seeing a black school uniform in a dream is a sign of the many pressures and problems in the dreamer and the effort to succeed in his life and triumph over his enemies. Seeing blue clothes In a dream, the sign of

title: Interpretation of wheat in a dream The meaning of wheat and flour in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Grains of wheat in the dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, ears of green wheat, harvest, washing the field with wheat and flour. Seeing wheat in a dream means many connotations and interpretations that can only bring meanings related to the real events that the dreamer goes through in his daily life or Events that could happen in the near future of his life. Whoever dreams that he has a wheat field, this indicates the abundance of money that he will earn in the next period of his life and it can also indicate gold that the dreamer owns or may inherit in the near future. Whoever dreams of eating Wheat in his dream is a sign that he will live a virtuous life without impurities and problems and will be happy in his life on various realistic levels. Whoever dreams that he is eating dry or cooked wheat, this is an indication that he will face many problems and difficulties in his life, whether on the professional, social, or even family level. If a person dreams that he has wheat that he stores in warehouses and he soon falls ill, this is a sign that he will illegally obtain abundant money, and this matter seems unfit for his life on earth. Whoever sees in his dream that he is selling wheat to others, this is a sign that he will achieve Abundant profits from small businesses that he will do in the near future. But if he sells wheat at exorbitant prices, this is evidence that he will follow the path of evil and corruption. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying wheat, this is a sign that he will make a lot of profits, get a lot of money, and become wealthy. If you see in your dreams vast fields of wheat or wheat, It means that your interests will take encouraging signs. If the wheat is ripe, it is a confirmation of your luck and your love will be your happy companion. If you see clean and large wheat grains spinning in the wheat threshing, this indicates that prosperity has opened its doors wide for you. If you see wheat or wheat In bags or in a barrel, your determination to reach the pinnacle of success will be crowned with victory and the foundations of love relationships will be consolidated. If your grain or cereal stock is not well covered and you see its contents wet, this foretells that while you are accumulating wealth you have forgotten to reserve your rights and you will see your interests diminished. At the hands of enemies. If you rub an ear in your hands and eat it, you will work hard to achieve success and you will obtain and be assured of your rights. If you dream that you are climbing a steep hill covered with wheat or wheat and imagine that you are pulling yourself up by relying on stalks of wheat or wheat, this means that you will enjoy great success Thus you will be able to make yourself outstanding in any profession you choose. If you thresh wheat in a dream, this portends success in your work environment and family happiness. If the amount of wheat is large and the wheat is small, it means that you will enter into unsuccessful businesses and projects. If you have an accident or Occurred while studying wheat, it means that sorrows will cut off your joys suddenly. Wheat flour in a dream or a dream is the wealth of a group and children, and kneading means that the brewer will travel to his relatives.

If you have an accident or Occurred while studying wheat, it means that sorrows will cut off your joys suddenly. title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of buying a new car: The car has become a necessary thing in our lives and cannot be overlooked. Buying it is considered a luxury and a high economic level according to the value of the car. In this article, there are a large number of major cases and interpretations, and scholars and commentators have presented it, such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of buying a new car: Buying a new car in A dream is one of the visions that carry many associations and signs that can be identified through the following cases: The dreamer who dreams of buying a new car indicates the large financial gains that he will obtain in the upcoming work period or a permissible inheritance. Seeing buying a new car in a dream indicates the arrival of joys. And happy occasions in the dreamer’s life. Buying a new car in a dream is a sign of recovery from sickness and illness and enjoyment of health and well-being. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is buying a new car, this symbolizes a lot of good and abundant money that he will obtain in the coming period. Dreaming of buying a new car indicates Marriage of single people and enjoy a quiet and stable life. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car for individuals. The interpretation of a dream about buying a new car varies depending on the social status of the dreamer, and after that we will interpret the sight of this symbol for an unmarried girl: An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is buying a new car indicates her relationship with the knight of her dreams. And her marriage to him soon. Seeing that she is buying a new car in a dream for an unmarried woman means that her situation will change for the better and she will move to a high social level like the beauty and luxury of the Arabian Peninsula. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is buying a new car, this symbolizes the cleanliness of her bed, her good morals, and her good reputation among the people of the world. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing mud in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing mud in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. To see mud in a dream indicates sin and disobedience, and mud with water indicates trouble, as mud is used and can be a threat in some places. Seeing a dreamer eating clay means that he earned money in the dream. As for seeing clay in architecture, it indicates prosperity and goodness, and seeing clay in clothes is a sin. The dream of seeing clay by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains clay in a dream, which indicates the positive energy of the master of dreams and allows him to control his future according to his will. The person who saw clay in The dream is evidence that the master of the dreams has the desire to complete a business or achieve success. The researcher Ibn Sirin also explained that the clay in the dream shows the weakness of the dreamer’s character. As for whoever sees himself making pottery in the dream, his dream indicates that the dreamer is struggling for lawful money. A single woman dreams of seeing mud. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is walking on a muddy and bumpy road, the dream shows her kindness and enters a stable path, and the dream is a sign of success or success. As for single women who find their shoes full of mud and try to clean the shoes, their dreams are... It indicates that they have a strong will and determination to improve their situations and affairs. But if an unmarried woman sees that she took off her shoes and walked in the mud without mud, then her dream indicates that she is on the path to success. However, if the girl in her dreams puts on her shoes after walking in the street, then her dream It means marriage at the end of the year. Dream of seeing mud for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that her two children are playing in the mud and one of them falls into the mud, it is recommended for her to dream this dream because it implies abundant foreign exchange reserves and a period of prosperity. Preserve her family. Perhaps seeing muddy dreams for a married woman will increase her monthly salary. This dream is generally in a married woman’s dream, which indicates family happiness and the arrival of a better life. Dreaming of seeing mud for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is walking on a muddy road and feels that her steps are starting to become heavy And slowly and almost falling into the mud, her dream will herald her birth. Perhaps her dream indicates a natural birth, and in general it is recommended for a pregnant woman to dream of muddy mud, and the interpretation says that it is gentle, optimistic, safe for the fetus and facilitates the birth process. She dreams of seeing mud and falling into it. Seeing a dreamer falling into Swamp and getting rid of problems proves his ability to get rid of problems that made him unhappy throughout his life. Once again, this vision shows that one can recover from visionary diseases. Seeing a dreamer walking easily in the mud is evidence of many forbidden behaviors. Once again, it shows This vision indicates the extent to which the dreamer does not fulfill his religious duties. Liquid clay also indicates that the dreamer will soon receive generous money. Anyway, this is what the dreamer indicates when he sees the dough fermenting and making something like clay or something like that. Dream vision

title: Interpretation of a flood in a dream and torrents in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of surviving the sea flood in the homeland, escaping from the flood, for the faithful Imam, for the unmarried, for the married, for the pregnant woman. The symbol of flood waters in a dream. Seeing a flood in a dream indicates the treacherous attack of the enemy. Anyone who sees heavy rain in a dream will get hurt or get sick. Sometimes, rainfall can be interpreted Heavy travel, and if torrents and torrents enter the storerooms, this indicates that there will be a flood or that the ruler of Amlik will be unjust and unjust. And seeing the flood and torrents indicates the enemy. Whoever dreams in a dream that a torrent and flood enters the city and drags with it corpses, corpses, and blood, then the people of this country will be punished with God’s punishment. He sees in a dream that a flood or torrent has come at the wrong time, then this is innovation that comes from the place of flood and flood. Whoever sees in a dream that a torrent or flood has entered his house or the houses surrounding it and taken crops, money, and animals, then he will turn against them as an enemy and harm them. From Dreaming of a flood or heavy rain in the winter, this indicates people who do not understand religion and disobey God Almighty. Whoever sees in a dream that a flood and torrents enter the city and swims in it and is saved, then he will be saved from the tyranny and oppression of the king. Whoever sees the same dream and fails in his attempt to escape, he should beware. Of the lords and rulers and he tries to please his official. As for seeing the flood cloudy or red in the dream, a disease will spread in the area that the flood or torrents entered. Another interpretation of the symbol of the flood in a dream: For a dream, entering cities, indicates an epidemic if its people are infected or its color is like the color of Blood. Torrent and flood in a dream indicate invasion of forces, or soldiers entering safely, if people do not panic, fear, or flee. If the flood destroys their homes and causes damage to their goods, money, or animals, then in the dream it is a symbol of the enemy or an unjust person. Come up with the interpretation: The torrent and flood indicate the attack and brutality of enemies. If in the dream it appears that the gutters are flowing without rain, this is a sign that blood is flowing in That country or location. If the dreamer sees that the gutters are falling from the rain and water is spilling, then these are fears that are removed from the people of that place. If the gutters are not controlled, then it is less than that, or vice versa. Whoever sees in a dream that he closes the door of his house and prevents it from heavy rain or torrential rain, then his condition will be cured and he will protect himself and his family from harm. A story narrated by Ibn Sirin fits the interpretation of torrent, flood, and flood in a dream. It is said that a man came To Ibn Shirin and he said: I saw rivers flowing without rain, and I saw people taking from them. The man replied: I did not do anything, and I did not take anything from him.. Ibn Shirin replied: Well done, and he did not wait a while until a trial took place in those countries and the seer and his family fled from it. It was called the trial of Ibn al-Muhallab. Gutters in dreams indicate mouths and throats, as well as faults flowing from the roofs of houses and homes, and in other places gutters indicate livelihood. Whoever sees in a dream people’s rivers flowing from the rain and these people are in difficulty or distress, then their livelihood will increase and

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the fetus moving in the abdomen in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fetal movement in the abdomen by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing fetal movement in the abdomen in a dream may indicate the arrival of goodness and happiness to the pioneer. Also, seeing fetal movement in a dream can indicate the collapse of fears, problems, and the large number of supplies that the dreamer will store with a coin. Also, seeing fetal movement in the abdomen in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will participate in a good job, a prestigious job, and high status. Interpretation of a dream about fetal movement in the abdomen for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream fetal movement in the abdomen, this indicates that her affairs will be facilitated in the future. The coming period, success and excellence. Also, seeing the movement of the fetus in the abdomen in a dream for an unmarried woman can indicate happiness and good news that will be promising, as well as divine providence. Also, seeing the movement of the fetus in the abdomen in a dream indicates that the girl will enter a new job and provide A lot of money and achieving her future ambitions. Seeing fetal movement in the abdomen in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate her close marriage to a good man who has a high status, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about fetal movement in the abdomen for a married woman. If a married woman sees fetal movement in her dream, this indicates that she She will become pregnant soon, which will give her good news, and God knows best. Also, seeing the movement of the fetus in the abdomen in a married woman’s dream may indicate the achievement of her upcoming goals in addition to happiness and pleasure. Also, seeing the movement of the fetus in the abdomen in a married woman’s dream may indicate the collapse of marital disputes, As well as happiness and happiness for her children. Interpretation of a dream about intense fetal movement for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees fetal movement in her dream, this indicates the end of her worries, the ease of her coming life, and the cessation of the pain of pregnancy. Also, seeing the movement of a pregnant woman’s fetus may indicate the nearness of her due date, and her management and ease with the male child. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a fetus moving in the abdomen in a dream for a man: If a merciful man sees fetal movement in a dream, this indicates that he has committed immorality and adultery, as well as not repenting to God Almighty. Also, seeing a fetus moving in the abdomen in a dream for a married man may indicate his death. His coming worries and pains and the provision of good offspring. Also, seeing the movement of the fetus in the abdomen can indicate happiness and pleasure, as well as the good news that he will be happy about in his coming days. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible. Available time.

title: Interpretation of seeing dough in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing dough Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing flour fermenting in a dream means that it is a good person who will receive a lot of sustenance and success from God in his life in general, and that whoever sees dough in his dream, this is evidence of earning money and abundant livelihood. Profit from work is the corruption of the work done by the dreamer, and when a person sees in his dream that the dough is spoiled and unusable, this indicates a great loss that leads to poverty. Interpretation of seeing eating dough in a dream Eating raw dough in a dream means that you are making quick and wrong decisions that lead to negative results. The opposite, and this is in contrast to dough for sweets and cakes, which are considered good things. Interpretation of seeing dough in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees dough in a dream and eats it and it tastes good, like what is used in making sweets, then this indicates good news or happy news, etc. that. The dough has a white consistency, and this indicates the fulfillment of the good wishes of the girl who dreamed, the answer to his prayers, her recovery from an illness or the achievement of large financial gains. Interpretation of seeing dough in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees dough in a dream and she is making dough, this is a sign of food and plenty of The good that awaits her, this is great good, and if a married woman sees that she is making dough. bread. From this and dispersing into a large group, this indicates that she has many responsibilities and that God will help her bear those responsibilities. Interpretation of seeing dough in a dream for a pregnant woman: Dreaming of a pregnant woman infected with yeast is a sign that good and great nutrition is coming, and this goodness may come at the earliest date. Giving birth and seeing her child and that she will give birth easily. Interpretation of seeing pieces of dough in a dream: Cutting dough in a dream, whether for a man or a woman, is considered good, which indicates that the dreamer has logic and sobriety in thinking and is slow in making decisions and managing various matters in life. flat.
